Package com.dua3.utility.options

Class ArgumentsParser

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.options.ArgumentsParser
public class ArgumentsParser extends Object
A parser that parses command line args into an Arguments instance.

      public Arguments parse(String... args)
      Parse the command line arguments and return an instance of Arguments.
      Parameters:
      args - the command line arguments to parse
      Returns:
      an instance of Arguments containing the parsed options and positional arguments
      Throws:
      OptionException - if an error is encountered during parsing
